questionLists.q: What area of the city is the school in?
questionLists.a: 130 Depot Rd, Singapore 109708 within Bukit Merah area

questionLists.q: What’s the closest public transport link to the school?
Can you recommend an area of the city to live in?
What’s the difference between an HDB and a condo?
questionLists.a: Condo. Swimming pool, gym, tennis courts, more facilities

questionLists.q: Do I need to be vaccinated/take lots of covid tests?
questionLists.a: Would be better if fully(including 3 jabs)

questionLists.q: Will I need to quarantine when I get there?
questionLists.a: If they arrive on a Vtl flight, no. (depends on when they come from)

questionLists.q: Can you recommend a bank/phone company/internet provider?
questionLists.a: Singtel , DBS bank, Singtel internet provider

questionLists.q: When should I arrive in Singapore?
questionLists.a: Two weeks before they start work

questionLists.q: Who is the school's MYP coordinator?
Who is the school's DP coordinator?
Who is the school's Stationery manager?
Who is the school's HR/admin staff?
Do everyone need to supervise CCAs?
questionLists.a: Everyone is expected to supervise CCAs
Wear masks all times, Must have Trace Together to access shops, buses, restaurants
